SELECT oat.token_id as tokenId, oat.token as token, oat.client_id as clientId, oc.web_server_redirect_uri as redirectUri, oc.access_token_validity as accessTokenValidity FROM oauth_access_token oat JOIN oauth_client oc WHERE oat.client_id = oc.name AND oat.user_name = #{userName}
AND oat.client_id = #{clientId}
